headline.main: Lighted, Marked Globe May Keep Top Officials Posted

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 7 -- Visual presentation of all the major facts of the war, as a substitute for a mass of written reports, is a project of Colonel William J. Donovan, Coordinator of Information, and his committee that has reached the advanced planning stage.
abstract: A Krock on plan for lighted, marked globe to show Eur war status

byline.original: By ARTHUR KROCKSpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES
